MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L31 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Brewery Street and surrounding streets. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repairs required to the overhead line network following third party damage and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8.30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.28PM on 30th October 2020.
